name: Kuju Coffee Pocket PourOver One-Cup Pouch Base Camp Blend Coffee
categories: Pocket PourOver One-Cup Pouch Base Camp Blend
description: With just the right amount of acidity, notes of oak, honey and chocolate, and a full-bodied finish, Base Camp Blend is good enough to drink even when you're not camping. Developed by 2 Eagle Scouts who were fed up with instant coffee, Kuju delivers your morning caffeine hit with the ease of dropping a tea bag into a mug.Pocket PourOver™ delivers fresh coffee in moments.Steady-Safe™ anchor system attaches to most mugs.Nitro-Flush™ tech keeps coffee fresh for up to 12 months.Small batch-roasted coffee comes from a family farm in Thailand that employs people rescued from the sex trade, and pays above fair-trade wages.
